    CathSim

    Open-source Simulator for Endovascular Intervention

    Learn more

    Open-source simulator

    Fully open-source, promoting wider accessibility and collaborative improvements across the medical and academic communities.

    Learn more

    High-Fidelity Modeling and Real-Time Force Sensing

    Employs the MuJoCo physics engine for seamless, real-time interactions, significantly advancing the fidelity and responsiveness of surgical simulations.

    Learn more

    RL Performance Summary

    Utilizes sophisticated RL algorithms such as PPO and SAC to automate catheter navigation, pushing the boundaries of what is achievable in autonomous robotic surgeries.
